item.name: Scroll of Speak with Animals
entries: This spell scroll can be used to cast {@spell speak with animals}. Simply reading it aloud is enough to activate the spell within. It ignores normal class and level restrictions, and the effect applies to the entire party.

item.name: Wand of True Polymorph
entries: Formed of a long, thin twig taken from an oak tree, this wand holds {@dice 1d4 - 1} charges of {@spell True Polymorph}, with a minimum of 1. These can be cast by anybody with a spellcasting ability who has spent at least one hour attuning to the wand. The amount of charges resets at dawn each day.
In order to increase the amount of times the spell can be cast, the wand appears to have been fitted with a bulbous, rune-inscribed iron band and has cracks running along its length.

If inspected with a {@dc 15} Intelligence ({@skill Arcana}) check, reveal that the modifications have left the wand extremely unreliable. Each time a charge is used the user must pass a {@dc 17} Intelligence ({@skill Arcana}) check.
如果他们成功了，法术就会正常施展，并且永久使用它所需的DC增加1。

If they fail by five or less, the spell will transmute the target into a {@creature Gibbering Mouther} {@homebrew |(MM p157)}—a hideous lump of seemingly random limbs, organs and facial features. The creature will attack the nearest target mindlessly, babbling in dozens of broken voices.

This transformation cannot be undone by any spell lower than 9th level and cannot be cancelled by ending {@status concentration}. The target can make a saving throw against this effect in the same way they would against a regular casting of {@spell True Polymorph}.

If they fail by more than five, in addition to the above consequences the wand explodes violently, dealing {@damage 1d12} force damage to all creatures within 10 ft for each charge remaining in the wand. This destroys the wand.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Noke is a 7th level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}, spell attacks {@hit 6} to hit). He has the following spells prepared:

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

items.name: Slash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

items.name: Multiattack
entries: The ape makes two Slash attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Splinter Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The Bed Dragon Wyrmling send out a shower of wooden splinters in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity Save, taking 24 ({@damage 7d6}) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: Guz can choose to gain Advantage on all melee weapon attacks during his turn, but in return all attack rolls against him also have Advantage until the start of his next turn.

action.name: Whirling Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5ft., two separate targets. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

entries.name: Roleplaying Noke
entries: Noke once hero-worshipped {@creature Finethir Shinebright|WSC|Shinebright} and served as his apprentice for many years. However, as time dragged on and on there was never any change in their relationship.

Decades passed and still the master transmuter treated him like a child, expected to cook, clean and recite answers by rote. When Noke pressed him on it, {@creature Finethir Shinebright|WSC|Shinebright} would explain that his was how he had been taught, and didn't seem to register Noke's claims that, as a human, he couldn't spare a century to serve out an apprenticeship.
At the same time, Noke began to realise that much of Shinebright's acclaim came not from his own abilities—extensive as they were—but from the {@item Wand of True Polymorph|WSC} he wielded.
最终，他崩溃了，在把自己打造成一个巫师大师之前，他背叛了他的前主人。然而，负罪感和突然失控的野心相结合，给他的精神状态带来了坏消息。

He is paranoid that someone will attack him as he attacked {@creature Finethir Shinebright|WSC|Shinebright} and rarely sleeps. This paranoia has led him to invest in a troop of guards, many of whom he has transmuted into stronger, more bestial forms.

entries.name: Roleplaying Shinebright
entries: 傲慢、自恋，对自己的自我充满了膨胀感，菲奈瑟-辛布莱特是最不适合被改造成羊的人之一。不过，无论他的形态如何，这位前精灵巫师都能散发出一种挑剔、书生气十足的知识分子气息。
尽管他有缺陷，然而，他一般都是心地善良的。假设他注意到了这些缺点，而且不会给他带来太多不便，他就会尽可能地帮助别人，尽管他会大声地抱怨别人无法掌握像多平面交叉编织理论这样简单的概念。

Once upon a time the local nobles, merchants and arcanists spoke the name of Finethir Shinebright with respect, awe and grudging admiration. A master of transmutation, he would regularly be called upon to carry out grand tasks such as clearing blocked roads by turning massive boulders into rabbits. Two years as a sheep have taught him very little about humility, but a lot about grass. If he returns to his natural form, Shinebright is a willow-thin high elf with straw-coloured hair and an extremely long nose.

entries.name: Roleplaying Guz
entries: 古兹是一个粗壮的半兽人，他认为暴力和恐吓是实现其目标的唯一合理的方法。他还认为大多数人都有同样的感觉，所以他更喜欢先用自己的暴力。

Though to most outside observers he may appear evil, he is incredibly loyal to {@creature Ahmed Noke|WSC|Noke}—who genuinely doesn't care what a creature looks like on the outside—and owes him unswerving devotion.
古兹并不特别聪明，很容易被说话快的敌人所迷惑，不过这通常只会让他更加愤怒。

However, he is also fond of trying to use long, complicated words he has picked up from {@creature Ahmed Noke|WSC|Noke}—though the extent to which he actually understands what they mean is probably up for debate.
{@style A fourth/fifth level adventure for D&D 5E|dnd-font;large}

entries.name: Summary
entries: The party's attempt to grab a rare afternoon of downtime is interrupted by a frantic sheep equipped with a {@item Scroll of Speak with Animals|WSC|Scroll of Speak to Animals} and a fierce determination to get their attention. This is no mere beast, however, but a wizard fallen victim to an embittered apprentice wielding a {@item Wand of True Polymorph|WSC}.
变形的刺客正在寻找抓住自己的羊肉大餐，而唯一能够恢复他的对立拇指的物体却在他以前的学生和现在的克星手中。幸运的是，这个毛茸茸的巫师已经找到了他可以依赖的新盟友，对吗？
Can the heroes put an end to {@creature Ahmed Noke|WSC|Ahmed Noke's} transmutational tyranny and restore an innocent wizard to his true form? There's only one way to find out...

entries.name: Using This Adventure
entries: 正文分为几个不同的场景，每个场景涵盖一个地点、遭遇或主要情节点。其他信息、敌人的状态块和注解用灰色方框突出。
虽然可以即时运行游戏，但建议你在开始游戏前完整地阅读冒险故事。

entries.name: Adventure Hooks
entries: 让玩家进入这个冒险是非常简单的。所需要的是他们在一个足以容纳巫师的城镇或城市呆上几天。

If you want to plant seeds in advance, you may wish to introduce the character of {@creature Ahmed Noke|WSC|Noke} through rumours or idle conversation with shopkeepers and innkeepers, who view him with fear and awe.

entries.name: Baaaa-d News
entries: 冒险开始了，因为党员们闲置了一个下午。他们可能在酒馆里喝酒，在基地里休息，或者只是无忧无虑地走在街上。然而，无论他们身在何处，很快就会发现发生了一件非常奇怪的事情。

There is a sound of clattering hooves, surprised yelps and a frantic bleating, Before the party can react, a sheep bounds towards them. The beast appears to be a regular sheep in every way—fluffy white coat, black face, curled horns—but it is carrying and elaborate scroll in its mouth.
绵羊试图接近党内最有魔法天赋的成员，并向他们挥舞卷轴，如果他们伸手去拿，就让他们拿走。

A wax seal purports that it is a {@item Scroll of Speak with Animals|WSC|Scroll of Speak With Animals (Modified)}. If a character says this out loud—to explain to other party members, for example—the sheep appears to nod and bleat enthusiastically.

Should they use the scroll (simply reading it aloud is enough to activate the spell within), all of them hear the sheep's baaing instantly morphs into cultured, elven-accented {@language Common}, albeit with a slight hint of a bleat.

After establishing that the player can understand what it's saying, the sheep introduces itself as {@creature Finethir Shinebright|WSC}, a wizard in dire need of aid. If the players are willing to listen, he explains that he recognises them as adventurers and that he is in dire need of their aid.
Specifically, he wants them to help take back an extremely powerful magical artefact from a dangerous, possibly insane wizard.
He will attempt to tell his story, but shortly after he starts the sound of howling fills the air...

entries.name: Shepherds, Crooks

entries: A loud howling fills the air, accompanied by the sound of angry yells and the occasional scream that seem to be drawing closer and closer.

The cause quickly become apparent as a huge Half-Orc swaggers towards you, pushing his way through the crowd without a care for anybody standing in his way. In front of him walk what appear to be large wolves wearing iron collars, while a hulking figure in a dirty brown cloak travels in his wake with footfalls loud enough to be heard over the ruckus.
The Half-Orc sets his small eyes on you and strides forward with one hand resting on the hilt ofa greatsword.
"That sheep is Master Noke's... he desires to have it back."

The Half-Orc, {@creature Guz|WSC}, is accompanied by trio of collared {@creature Wolf||Wolves} {@homebrew |(MM p341)} with strangely intelligent eyes, while the huge figure behind him is actually a polymorphed {@creature Hulking Figure|WSC|Brown Bear} {@homebrew |(MM p319)}.

He demands that he be given "Master Noke's sheep," which he claimed has escaped, and is of great {@i sent-ee-ment-all} value to his master. Any mention of Shinebright's true nature is met with hollow, mirthless laughter.

{@creature Guz|WSC} is not a bright fellow, but he is very loyal and determined to complete his task. His trackers know that {@creature Finethir Shinebright|WSC|Shinebright} is there, no matter how well the party tries to hide him, and will not take no for an answer.
虽然他更喜欢暴力和恐吓，但如果看起来是最好的选择，他也愿意提供贿赂和魔法优惠的承诺。

If he feels like he's not making progress, {@creature Guz|WSC} will simply attack without warning. The {@creature Wolf||wolves} will follow him up, while the cloaked figure will let its hood fall and run into combat with a terrible roar.

The exact details of any battle that breaks out will depend on the location. If it takes place in an inn, tables and overturned chairs litter the floor. In a street, you may wish to have {@condition frightened} passers-by form zones of {@quickref difficult terrain||3}.

All of the beasts still have an intelligent human mind contained within them, and act intelligently. {@creature Guz|WSC} is happy to charge into the front line and take on any heavy hitters alongside the {@creature Hulking Figure|WSC|Brown Bear}.

Meanwhile the {@creature Wolf||Wolves} will aim to cut round behind the party in a bid to grab {@creature Finethir Shinebright|WSC|Shinebright}—he uses the statistics of a {@creature Finethir Shinebright|WSC|Pony but with INT and WIS scores of 18 and 14 respectively}.

They intend to capture {@creature Finethir Shinebright|WSC|Shinebright}, not kill him. If {@creature Guz|WSC} captures him, he and his allies will set off for Noke's home. The party will have to decide if they follow, potentially launching a chase scene.

entries.name: Roleplaying Shinebright
entries: 傲慢、自恋，对自己的自我充满了膨胀感，菲奈瑟-辛布莱特是最不适合被改造成羊的人之一。不过，无论他的形态如何，这位前精灵巫师都能散发出一种挑剔、书生气十足的知识分子气息。

A master of transmutation, he would regularly be called upon to carry out grand tasks such as clearing blocked roads by turning massive boulders into rabbits. Two years as a sheep have taught him very little about humility, but a lot about grass. If he returns to his natural form, Shinebright is a willow-thin high elf with straw-coloured hair and an extremely long nose.

entries.name: After the Dust Settles
entries: Once Noke's goons have been defeated, distracted or otherwise dealt with, {@creature Finethir Shinebright|WSC|Shinebright} pleads with the party. Without their help, he is doomed. Noke still has many guards still working for him and eventually they will find him.

If they're feeling mercenary, he reminds the party that in his true form he is a powerful and wealthy wizard and promises great rewards. He is more than willing to commit to deals that he knows he can't actually fulfil.
In any case, Shinebright will explain:

items: Until two years ago he owned and worked out of a tower on the outskirts of town. He was a wizard of no small talent, specialising in transmutation magic. His most prized possession—and probably the key to his success—was an incredibly rare {@item Wand of True Polymorph|WSC}.

One fateful night he ended from his meditative trance to find his apprentice, {@creature Ahmed Noke|WSC}, standing over him, clutching the {@item Wand of True Polymorph|WSC|wand}. Shinebright demanded to know what the boy was doing, but the only noise he could produce was an angry 'baaaaah'.
The wizard became a virtual prisoner in his own garden. He was forced to graze on nothing but grass and buttercups while hungry wolves and other beasts—actually polymorphed guards—looked on.

Last night he felt hope for the first time in many months when Noke left his home without closing the door. Shinebright snuck in, made his way to an old bookshelf and stole the {@item Scroll of Speak with Animals|WSC|Scroll of Speak to Animals}. He then rushed into town with the scroll clenched between his teeth, and was searching desperately for the aura of magic that would indicate someone able to activate the spell when he found the party.
In order to turn back into his original form he needs another dose of {@spell True Polymorph}. Which means he needs access to his old {@item Wand of True Polymorph|WSC|wand}.

His former apprentice still dwells in Shinebright's old home, located just to the south-east of town. He keeps the {@item Wand of True Polymorph|WSC|wand} on him at all times and only leaves if he absolutely has to.
他对自己老家的布局非常了解，而且非常乐意用无尽的细节来描述。

entries.name: Roleplaying Guz
entries: 古兹是一个粗壮的半兽人，他认为暴力和恐吓是实现其目标的唯一合理的方法。他还认为大多数人都有同样的感觉，所以他更喜欢先用自己的暴力。

Though to most outside observers he may appear evil, he is incredibly loyal to {@creature Ahmed Noke|WSC|Noke}—who genuinely doesn't care what a creature looks like on the outside—and owes him unswerving devotion.
古兹并不特别聪明，很容易被说话快的敌人所迷惑，不过这通常只会让他更加愤怒。

However, he is also fond of trying to use long, complicated words he has picked up from {@creature Ahmed Noke|WSC|Noke}—though the extent to which he actually understands what they mean is probably up for debate.

entries.name: The House in the Woods
entries: 通往诺克塔的道路从镇外几英里处的一条主干道上切断，在灌木丛的缝隙间飞奔。这是一条被人熟知的路线，很快就开始在高大的橡树之间蜿蜒前行。
Anyone who cares to examine the path for tracks will easily see the impression of many feet and paws, with the most fresh sets appearing to match up with the group led by {@creature Guz|WSC}.
这条小路继续穿过稀疏的林地，可能有一英里，没有任何居住的迹象。除非他们知道要找什么，否则当辛布赖特的老房子从树梢上出现时，等待他们的景象可能会让他们感到有些惊讶。
你面前的房子不是石头或玻璃，而是由四棵结实的橡树的活枝形成。这些树枝经过整形和编织，形成了三个厚实的平台。
这些平台中最低的一个大约有40英尺宽，离地面约10英尺。唯一明显的上行路线是一个由树根和树枝组成的缓坡，与主路大致相连。
树枝围绕着它的底部卷曲，在它周围形成一个粗糙的碗状。从你站立的地方，有可能看到花和小树在它的边缘生长。
到目前为止，三个平台中最大的是中间的那个，看起来大约有60英尺宽。它离地面约20英尺，用扭曲的树枝形成的墙完全封闭起来。你可以看到均匀分布的、窗户大小的缝隙，以及在最靠近花园平台的地方似乎有一个门。
The final, tallest platform is roughly 30ft above the ground, and is much smaller than the others. It looks to be linked to the central platform by another small slope.
Scattered beneath the platforms are two small wooden huts and a large outhouse.

entries.name: Roleplaying Noke
entries: Noke once hero-worshipped {@creature Finethir Shinebright|WSC|Shinebright} and served as his apprentice for many years. However, as time dragged on and on there was never any change in their relationship.

Decades passed and still the master transmuter treated him like a child, expected to cook, clean and recite answers by rote. When Noke pressed him on it, {@creature Finethir Shinebright|WSC|Shinebright} would explain that his was how he had been taught, and didn't seem to register Noke's claims that, as a human, he couldn't spare a century to serve out an apprenticeship.
At the same time, Noke began to realise that much of Shinebright's acclaim came not from his own abilities—extensive as they were—but from the {@item Wand of True Polymorph|WSC} he wielded.
最终，他崩溃了，在把自己打造成一个巫师大师之前，他背叛了他的前主人。然而，负罪感和突然失控的野心相结合，给他的精神状态带来了坏消息。

He is paranoid that someone will attack him as he attacked {@creature Finethir Shinebright|WSC|Shinebright} and rarely sleeps. This paranoia has led him to invest in a troop of guards, many of whom he has transmuted into stronger, more bestial forms.

When the party arrives at the compound, there is a trio of {@creature Ape (Greatsword)|WSC|Apes} {@homebrew |(MM p317)} either sleeping or playing with an oversized pair of dice on the lawn, with iron {@item greatsword|PHB|greatswords} stuck into the ground next to them. A {@creature Brown Bear} is in the outhouse, taking care of business.

The door to the central platform is almost always locked, requiring a {@dc 14} Strength ({@skill Athletics}) to break down or a {@dc 12} {@item Thieves' Tools|PHB} check to pick. Inside, the area is divided up in to three sections. One contains a combination library and lab, one a sitting room and one dining room/kitchen. Untidy bookshelves line much of the outer walls and worktables are covered with stacks of ink-spattered notes and complicated anatomical diagrams of various beasts and monsters.
The tallest platform functions as a bedroom for {@creature Ahmed Noke|WSC|Noke}, containing little beyond a wardrobe, a large wooden bed and a cluttered dressing table.
这些小屋每间都有一到两张床，其中有几张是超大的，还有住在里面的普通人的一般杂物。

No{@creature Ahmed Noke|WSC|Noke}ke is in the central platform, working furiously on new spells. If he notices the party as they approach he will order them to "return the sheep—in return I will not destroy you all."

If they talk, he will reveal his reasons for hating {@creature Finethir Shinebright|WSC|Shinebright} and boast disjointedly of his own achievements. He will also ask if they killed 'my man, Guz,' and be visibly upset if they have. Should they refuse to return {@creature Finethir Shinebright|WSC|Shinebright} he will order his men to attack.

The most important part of any fight that breaks out is {@creature Ahmed Noke|WSC|Noke}, who is offensively weak but can buff his allies dramatically. Once the {@creature Brown Bear} emerges from the outhouse he will cast {@spell Enlarge/Reduce} {@homebrew |(PHB p237)} on it to increase its damage. He will supplement his minions''' attacks with {@spell Ray of Frost} {@homebrew |(PHB p271)} but will focus on keeping up {@status concentration}.

The {@creature Ape (Greatsword)|WSC|Apes} will act intelligently, and as they are wielding {@item greatsword|PHB|greatswords} their {@b Fist} attack is replaced by a {@b Slash} that deals 10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage. They aren't likely to fight to the death and will flee once they fall below half health.

Once it is clear that the fight is lost, or a player simply gets too close to him, {@creature Ahmed Noke|WSC|Noke} will cast {@spell Expeditious Retreat} {@homebrew |(PHB p238)} and flee into the central platform, locking the door behind him. He will move to his bedroom as fast as he can and casts {@spell True Polymorph} on the largest thing he can find—his bed.

Three rounds after he runs away he bursts from the roof of his bedroom riding the {@creature Bed Dragon Wyrmling|WSC}, a beast that looks like a dragon carved from wood, with billowing bedsheets for wings and a tail that ends in a soft pillow. If the party are in the main living area he will crash through the ceiling and attack.

The Wyrmling is not that smart and will use its Splinter Breath as often as possible, simply trying to attack the closest target when it is not available. It will, however, prioritise enemies that use fire against it. While riding the Wyrmling, {@creature Ahmed Noke|WSC|Noke} will simply use {@spell Ray of Frost} to slow down any party members trying to retreat.

Should the Wyrmling be lost–either to damage or because {@creature Ahmed Noke|WSC|Noke} loses {@status concentration}–it will turn back into a thoroughly beaten-up old bed. Desperate and unwilling to let his old master win, a babbling {@creature Ahmed Noke|WSC|Noke} will then attempt to use the {@item Wand of True Polymorph|WSC|wand} on himself, intending to transmute his form into that of some monstrous creature.

However, the over-used {@item Wand of True Polymorph|WSC|wand} will crackle, fizz and malfunction with a loud bang, turning {@creature Ahmed Noke|WSC|Noke} into a {@creature Gibbering Mouther} {@homebrew |(MM p157)}—a misshapen pile of flesh that bellows incoherently from dozens of mouths. The sad creature will attack mindlessly until completely destroyed.

entries.name: Ewe are Very Clever
entries: {@creature Ahmed Noke|WSC|Noke} is naturally paranoid and Shinebright's recent escape hasn't exactly improved his outlook. This makes luring him away from the safety of his tower an extremely difficult task, though not an impossible one.
诺克对名声和权力的渴望，至少在目前来说，略微超过了他对被推翻的恐惧。这意味着，一个非常、非常熟练的骗子，如果有足够狡猾的计划和良好的运气，可能会用一份特别有声望、有利可图的合同来诱惑他。

Even so, when {@creature Ahmed Noke|WSC|Noke} leaves he will take all of his remaining bodyguards with him and will be extremely quick to suspect the party of betrayal if there is any hint of a double-cross.

He will, of course, have his {@item Wand of True Polymorph|WSC|wand} to hand at all times. Should he be given enough time to cast it, {@creature Ahmed Noke|WSC|Noke} will use a charge of {@spell True Polymorph} to transmute some nearby item into a Wyrmling that uses roughly the same stats as the {@creature Bed Dragon Wyrmling}. Depending on what it was made from, it may not have the same flavour and might need to have its resistances/vulnerabilities tweaked slightly.

entries.name: Big Choices
entries: Should the players recover the {@item Wand of True Polymorph|WSC|wand} it becomes immediately obvious that it is damaged. Anyone proficient in {@skill Arcana} can tell that it has been modified so it can be used more often, but overuse has rendered it extremely unreliable.

If they wish to speak to {@creature Finethir Shinebright|WSC|Shinebright}, a quick search of the central platform will allow them to find another {@item Scroll of Speak with Animals|WSC}. At the sight of his former apprentice's ruined corpse, {@creature Finethir Shinebright|WSC|Shinebright} may even undergo some realisation of how poorly he treated his former apprentice and turn somber despite his triumph.

Even if he is made aware of the dangers associated with his old {@item Wand of True Polymorph|WSC|wand}, {@creature Finethir Shinebright|WSC|Shinebright} will still be willing to risk his life in order to be turned back into an Elf. However, he is also open to persuasion if the party try to talk him out of it. A compelling argument and a {@dc 15} Charisma ({@skill Persuasion}) will be enough to make the former Wizard reconsider his options.
Before undergoing the risk of having the spell performed on him, {@creature Finethir Shinebright|WSC|Shinebright} will ask that if he does die, the party send word to his old college.

entries.name: Consequences
If the party decides to go ahead with the spell and it succeeds,
entries: {@creature Finethir Shinebright|WSC|Shinebright} congratulates the party heartily. He will have to be reminded of anything he actually promised them while he was still a sheep, and cannot actually pay any financial reward, as {@creature Ahmed Noke|WSC|Noke} was virtually bankrupt and had sold most items to pay for research materials and guards.

He will, however, be willing to perform transmutations of up to 5th level for them, charging just enough to cover the components. He will also take in any polymorphed guards who fled, promising to work towards returning them to their natural shapes.

entries.name: If the party decides to go ahead with the spell and it fails,
entries: {@creature Finethir Shinebright|WSC|Shinebright} dies permanently. The party is free to honour his final wish and leave the tower more-or-less intact, or loot to their hearts' content. The tower is surprisingly empty of anything of benefit to non-transmuters, however, with valuables restricted to expensive lab equipment and arcane paraphernalia estimated to be worth around 1,000gp. If the players wish they can also take the entire tower complex as their own, though this may cause trouble when the local nobles try to pay {@creature Ahmed Noke|WSC|Noke} a visit and find him missing...

entries.name: If the party refuse to perform the spell,
entries: {@creature Finethir Shinebright|WSC|Shinebright} accepts but will not give up his hopes entirely. He will take back his old home and work towards a way to remove his curse. In any case, he heads to the bedroom and slips on one of his old robes, which he wears until he is transformed back to his natural shape. Though he will be upset with them, Shinebright will acknowledge that he owes the party a large debt.
In any case, any adventurers that help {@creature Finethir Shinebright|WSC|Shinebright} to deal with {@creature Ahmed Noke|WSC|Noke} each receive {@b 500xp}.

entries.name: Not Like This...
entries: A stealthy party may be able to steal the wand while {@creature Ahmed Noke|WSC|Noke} sleeps or a combination of lucky roles and inventive tactics may allow a player to disarm the wizard.
如果发生这种情况，不要强迫故事回到 "理想的道路 "上，而是让它自然发展。

One thing that you must do, however, is try to provide at least a hint of the dangers associated with the {@item Wand of True Polymorph|WSC|modified wand} before the players try and use it. Possibly it sparks unnaturally when a character touches it, or {@creature Ahmed Noke|WSC|Noke} himself may feel honour bound to warn them.
